Sentencas: New technologies are being developed to produce electricity cleaner and more efficient.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Promising technologies among these are the solid oxide fuel cell and the supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: This study investigates the potential of integrating both technologies.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell is known as a potentially clean and highly efficient technology to convert chemical energy to electricity.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: The high operating temperatures (600-1000 degrees C) allow the possibility of a bottoming cycle to utilize the high quality excess heat and also facilitate reforming processes, making it possible to use higher hydrocarbons as fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: The supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle has received attention as a promising power cycle.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: It has already been identified as a suitable cycle for relatively low temperature, compared to traditional gas turbines, heat sources for several reasons.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Firstly because of the high efficiency, around 40%-45% for the common simple recuperative cycle.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Secondly, because the turbine inlet temperature of a supercritical carbon dioxide is around 700 degrees C is low, compared to well over 1000 degrees C for a common air Brayton cycle.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: This is especially of interest because solid oxide fuel cell developers are targeting lower operating temperatures to avoid the use of exotic and expensive materials.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: And thirdly, the cycle can operate entirely above the critical point.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Therefore the temperature increases gradually with the energy added to the cycle.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: This is more suitable for waste heat because the exergy loss decreases and more low temperature heat can be utilized compared to a steam Rankine cycle where most of the heat is added above the relatively high boiling point of pressurized water.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: A thermodynamic model of the solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system is developed to explore and analyze different concepts of integration.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system
A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Firstly it is found that recirculating cathodic air increases the efficiency of the system and decreases the size of the heat exchangers.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Secondly, applying a pinch point optimization decreases the size of the heat exchangers but increases the complexity of the system while the efficiency is not much affected.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Thirdly, applying the recompression cycle in stead of a simple recuperative supercritical carbon dioxide cycle increases the efficiency of the system but not as significantly when operating the supercritical carbon dioxide as a stand-alone system while the complexity of the system increases even more.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: And finally, compared to a directly coupled solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine system the solid oxide fuel cell- supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system is more efficient but significantly more complex.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell-supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle hybrid system
